content:
# It seems that despite moving to the iron ore position, the game still considers me too far away to place the stone furnace. 
# This could be due to the way the position is being interpreted or a misunderstanding of the current player position.

# To resolve this, I will first check my current position to ensure I am indeed at the iron ore location.
current_position = get_player_position()  # Get the current player position
print(f'Current player position: {current_position}')  # Output the current position

# If I am indeed at the iron ore position, I will attempt to place the furnace again. 
# If not, I will move closer to the iron ore position.
